column5: My place is close to everything in Abilene.. Youâ€™ll love my place because it is in a quiet, safe neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. There are three rooms available and one bath. Living area is open as well. I live in a separate part of the house. It is UNFURNISHED. Please be aware I do have a dog in the house, as can be seen in the picture. She is harmless and hasn't barked at another human. Her name is Athena.
